oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A simple and new method for the synthesis of 1,5-benzodiazepine derivatives on a solid surface
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
KABOUDIN, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: benzodiazepine
magnesium oxide
phosphorus oxychloride
ketones
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnesium oxide/phosphorus oxychloride (MOPO) was found to be an efficient reagent for the preparation of 1,5-benzodiazepine derivatives of o-phenylenediamine and ketones. This method is an easy, rapid, and high yielding reaction for the synthesis of 1,5-benzodiazepine derivatives.
